contentTypes.infographics: 1000x1500 vertical format with clear typography, high contrast, and marca-consistent colors. Include 3-5 data points per pin.

faq.question: What's the size for Pinterest pins in 2025?
faq.answer: Standard pins work at 1000x1500 pixels (2:3 aspect ratio) for optimal display and engagement. Square pins (1000x1000) also perform well for certAIn content types like products and infographics.

faq.question: How do I ottimizza Pinterest images for mobile vs desk?
faq.answer: Focus on mobile-first design with 1000x1500 vertical format. Ensure text is readable on small screens (24pt minimum), Usa high contrast colors, and test your pins on mobile devices before publishing.

faq.question: What file format should I Usa for Pinterest pins?
faq.answer: Usa JPG for photographic content with 80-85% quality, PNG for graphics with text, and consider WebP for 25% smaller file sizes with comparable quality. Always keep file sizes under 32MB.

faq.question: How do I Crea effective Pinterest video thumbnAIls?
faq.answer: Extract the most engaging frame from your video, add compelling text overlay (under 60 characters), and ensure 1080x1920 dimensioni. Include a clear call-to-action and marca elements for consistency.

faq.question: What are the latest Pinterest image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include authentic imperfection, bold typography overlays, sustAInable/earth-tone aesthetics, and 90s nostalgia with vintage filters. Video content continues to dominate, with short-form vertical video leading engagement.

faq.question: What's the size for TikTok profile pictures in 2025?
faq.answer: TikTok profile pictures should be 200x200 pixels with high quality. Remember they display as circles, so keep important elements away from the edges and ensure your design works with circular cropping.

faq.question: How do I Crea effective TikTok video thumbnAIls?
faq.answer: Scegli frames with emotional impact, add compelling text in the upper third, Usa bright colors, and include faces when possible. ottimizza for 1080x1920 pixels and ensure the thumbnAIl tells a story in 3 seconds.

faq.question: What image specifications do I need for TikTok ads?
faq.answer: TikTok image ads should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16) or 1080x1080 pixels (1:1) with file sizes under 50MB. Usa JPG or PNG formats and ensure high quality for optimal .

faq.question: How do I ottimizza images for TikTok Stories?
faq.answer: Design for full-screen 1080x1920 pixels, leave 10% margins for UI elements, Usa large readable text, and include space for interactive stickers and polls.

faq.question: What are the current TikTok image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Popular trends include Y2K revival aesthetics, cottagecore reimagined, dark academia, and cyberpunk pop. Neon color palettes are trending for entertAInment content, while minimalist earth tones work well for educational and wellness content.

faq.question: What's the size for Instagram posts in 2025?
faq.answer: Square posts at 1080x1080 pixels work for most content. PortrAIt posts at 1080x1350 pixels (4:5 ratio) perform well for vertical content, while landscape posts at 1080x566 pixels (1.91:1 ratio) work for horizontal content.

faq.question: How should I size images for Instagram Stories?
faq.answer: Instagram Stories should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16 aspect ratio). Leave a safe zone of 1080x1420 pixels in the center to avoid important content being covered by Instagram's UI elements.

faq.question: What are Instagram Reels cover photo requirements?
faq.answer: Reels cover photos should be 1080x1920 pixels with a 9:16 aspect ratio. Usa high-quality, engaging thumbnAIls that represent the video content and include marcaing elements.

faq.question: How do I ottimizza carousel posts for Instagram?
faq.answer: Usa consistent dimensioni (1080x1080 square recommended) for all carousel images. MAIntAIn a cohesive visual style while telling a story or showcasing different angles/products across the carousel.

faq.question: What are the current Instagram image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include minimalist maximalism (clean composition with bold elements), authentic realism (unfiltered genuine moments), digital art fusion (photography with digital elements), and sustAInable aesthetics with earth tones and natural contexts.

faq.question: What's the size for YouTube thumbnAIls in 2025?
faq.answer: YouTube thumbnAIls should be 1280x720 pixels (16:9 aspect ratio) with a minimum of 640x360 pixels. Usa high-contrast colors, large readable text (minimum 60pt), and include faces with emotions for 30-40% higher CTR.

faq.question: How do I ottimizza YouTube channel banners for all devices?
faq.answer: Crea banners at 2560x1440 pixels with critical content in the center safe zone (1546x423 pixels). Test on mobile, desk, and TV as YouTube displays different portions on each device.

faq.question: What are YouTube Shorts thumbnAIl requirements?
faq.answer: YouTube Shorts thumbnAIls should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16 vertical format). Crea scroll-sping first frames, Usa full-screen impact, and ottimizza for mobile viewing where 70% of YouTube traffic occurs.

faq.question: How do I Crea effective YouTube end screens?
faq.answer: Design end screens at 1920x1080 pixels with elements in the safe zone (85% of frame with 10% margins). Maximum 4 elements, each 300x300 pixels, positioned 20-30 seconds before video end.

faq.question: What are current YouTube thumbnAIl trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include minimalist impact design (clean with bold elements), authentic connection (real, unfiltered moments), digital innovation (AR effects and futuristic elements), and nostalgic modern (retro styles with contemporary twists).

faq.question: What's the size for Facebook posts in 2025?
faq.answer: Facebook posts work at 1200x630 pixels (1.91:1 ratio) for optimal display. Square posts at 1080x1080 pixels also perform well, as do portrAIt posts at 1080x1350 pixels (4:5 ratio).

faq.question: How do I ottimizza Facebook cover photos for all devices?
faq.answer: Upload cover photos at 2048x1152 pixels to ensure quality across devices. Important content should be in the center safe zone (100px margins from edges) as Facebook displays different portions on desk vs mobile.

faq.question: What are Facebook Marketplace photo requirements?
faq.answer: Marketplace photos should be 1200x900 pixels (4:3 ratio) with a minimum of 800x600 pixels. Usa high-quality, well-lit photos showing products clearly. Maximum 20 photos per listing with 10MB file size limit each.

faq.question: How should I size Facebook Stories for optimal engagement?
faq.answer: Facebook Stories should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16 vertical format). Leave a 10% margin around edges for UI elements, Usa large readable text, and include interactive elements like polls and stickers.

faq.question: What are current Facebook image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include authentic connection (real, unpolished moments), minimalist ism (clean design with purposeful color Usa), bold expression (vibrant colors and typography), and sustAInable visuals (earth tones and eco-friendly contexts).

faq.question: What's the size for Discord profile pictures?
faq.answer: Discord profile pictures should be 128x128 pixels for optimal display across the platform.

faq.question: How should I size Discord server icons?
faq.answer: Server icons work at 512x512 pixels and will be automatically resized by Discord.

faq.question: What size should Discord emojis be?
faq.answer: Custom Discord emojis should be 128x128 pixels with a file size under 256KB.
